price: Wanaonyeshwa Moto asubuhi na jioni. Na itapo fika Saa ya Kiyama patasemwa: Waingizeni watu wa Firauni katika adhabu kali kabisa!
arabic: ٱلنَّارُ يُعۡرَضُونَ عَلَيۡهَا غُدُوّٗا وَعَشِيّٗاۚ وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡخِلُوٓاْ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ أَشَدَّ ٱلۡعَذَابِ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: al-nāru yuʿ'raḍūna ʿalayhā ghuduwwan waʿashiyyan wayawma taqūmu al-sāʿatu adkhilū āla fir'ʿawna ashadda al-ʿadhābi
